title: (x) bershka font -News Gothic {Pieter v R}
content:
can you identify this font?

[http://lowcostattitudespain.files.wordpress.com/2009/09/bershka-conde\_de\_penalver\_4\_0.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20100329002610/http:/lowcostattitudespain.files.wordpress.com/2009/09/bershka-conde_de_penalver_4_0.jpg)

it's from [bershka](http://web.archive.org/web/20100329002610/http:/www.bershka.com/) (used only on shop windows i think).  
sorry for the image, could not find any better!
author: capitalaslash

comments.content:
I think itâ€™s Trade Gothic: [http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/trade-gothic/](http://web.archive.org/web/20100329002610/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/trade-gothic/ "http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/trade-gothic/")

Pieter

i think news gothic fits better...  
thanks!
